modName: Skyrim Ini Loader - Manage your config files
summary: Designed to edit Skyrim Ini files, such as Skyrim.ini, enbseries.ini on an easy way.
descriptionHtml:
Do you have problems too with editing configuration files?

Skyrim Ini Loader lets you to edit them on an easy way:
- Open the conf files in tables, which means you don\'t have to look if you miss type or delete something more than you wanted
- Sort the tables alphabetically, or back to original order
- Always saving on the ORIGINAL order!
- Double click on a row, to search for the same on the other side

v1.2.4
- Up - Down buttons added.
- Font style and size added.
Fixes:
- Fixed saved file bug from 1.1. (Saved files were corrupt after save, couldn\'t open normally ever after)
- Fixed values edit bug, new row bug. (Now the app gets the basic separator of the tables and the values, so after save your file will load correctly)

\"Designed to edit Skyrim Ini files, such as Skyrim.ini, enbseries.ini on an easy way, but can be used to edit nearly every ini, inf, etc. files and simple configuration files, which uses \'=\' and \':\' between the text and the value, to set the values.\"
author: Caddaile
